message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a game-changer in its industry and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $15000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, but I believe the product's value justifies a higher price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16500. This is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's worth, while also being more affordable for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16000.

I understand that you're getting closer to the price you're comfortable with, Bob. However, I still believe the product's value justifies a higher price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $16250. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great deal for you.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. Based on my budget and the value I perceive in the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16000.

I understand that you're sticking to your budget, Bob. However, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $16100. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to make a counteroffer of $16000.
I'm sorry, Bob, but I've reached my limit. I'm not willing to go any lower than $16050. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
